title: What Travel Looks Like in 2026
description: Travel in 2026 is expected to change fast. Dakota Smith, President and Co-Founder of Hopper, joined Bloomberg TV and radio to explain the trends shaping travel—from flexibility and disruption protection to AI-driven service. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Travel in 2026 is expected to change fast. Dakota Smith, President and Co-Founder of Hopper, joined Bloomberg TV and radio to explain the trends shaping travel—from flexibility and disruption protection to AI-driven service. (Source: Bloomberg)
